import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { const fadeIn = [ { opacity: 0 }, { opacity: 1 } ]; const fadeInTiming = { duration: 1000, iterations: 1, easing: 'ease-in-out' }; const heroElement = document.querySelector('.hero-content'); heroElement.animate(fadeIn, fadeInTiming); }, []); const products = [ { id: 1, name: "Product 1", price: "$99.99", image: "/product_images/product-1.webp" }, { id: 2, name: "Product 2", price: "$109.99", image: "/product_images/product-2.webp" }, { id: 3, name: "Product 3", price: "$89.99", image: "/product_images/product-3.webp" }, { id: 4, name: "Product 4", price: "$79.99", image: "/product_images/product-4.webp" }, ]; return (
